name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clipboard History Manager - Your Clipboard, Organized

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep a history of copied text and paste from your clipboard history.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep a history of copied text and allow users to paste from their clipboard history. Keep track of websites and the texts you copied from different sources and backtrack them with a beautiful highlighter.
